languages.text: "Мне удалось установить контакт с моим наставником и доложить о трагических событиях на Райкаде Минорис. Я также получил от своих агентов сведения о перемещениях и действиях врагов Человечества, в том числе и {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносах{/g}, которые, как мы предполагаем, могут быть замешаны в краже звезды. Согласно им, под угрозой находятся иные миры... на сей раз — ваши, Лорд-капитан".

traits.locale_text: "Мне удалось установить контакт с моим наставником и доложить о трагических событиях на Райкаде Минорисе. Я также получил от своих агентов сведения о перемещениях и действиях врагов Человечества, в том числе и ксеносах, которые, как мы предполагаем, могут быть замешаны в краже звезды. Согласно им, под угрозой находятся иные миры... на сей раз ваши, Лорд-капитан".

languages.text: "I was able to contact my mentor and report the tragic events that transpired on Rykad Minoris. I also received some information from my agents regarding the movements and actions of enemies of Humanity, including the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} that we're assuming were involved in the theft of the star. According to their findings, the threat now hangs over other worlds... this time yours, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "Мне удалось установить контакт с моим наставником и доложить о трагических событиях на Райкаде Минорис. Я также получил от своих агентов сведения о перемещениях и действиях врагов Человечества, в том числе и {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносах{/g}, которые, как мы предполагаем, могут быть замешаны в краже звезды. Согласно им, под угрозой находятся иные миры... на сей раз — ваши, Лорд-капитан".

traits.locale_text: "I was able to contact my mentor and report the tragic events that transpired on Rykad Minoris. I also received some information from my agents regarding the movements and the actions of enemies of humanity, including the xenos that we're assuming were involved in the theft of the star. According to their findings, the threat now hangs over other worlds... this time — yours, Lord Captain."

"I was able to contact my mentor and report the tragic events that transpired on Rykad Minoris. I also received some information from my agents regarding the movements and the actions of enemies of humanity, including the xenos that we're assuming were involved in the theft of the star. According to their findings, the threat now hangs over other worlds... this time — yours, Lord Captain."

According to their findings, the threat now hangs over other worlds... this time yours, Lord Captain."

"I was able to contact my mentor and report the tragic events that transpired on Rykad Minoris. I also received some information from my agents regarding the movements and actions of enemies of Humanity, including the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} that we're assuming were involved in the theft of the star. According to their findings, the threat now hangs over other worlds... this time yours, Lord Captain."

languages.text: 「メンターと連絡を取り、ライカド・ミノリスで起きた悲劇について報告した。また、エージェントから星の略奪に関与したと思われる{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}を含む、人類の敵の動向に関する情報も手に入れた。彼らの調査結果によると、その脅威は今や他の惑星にも及び…今度はあなたの惑星をも掌握しようとしているようだ、ロード・キャプテン」
languages.original_text: "I was able to contact my mentor and report the tragic events that transpired on Rykad Minoris. I also received some information from my agents regarding the movements and actions of enemies of Humanity, including the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} that we're assuming were involved in the theft of the star. According to their findings, the threat now hangs over other worlds... this time yours, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: 「メンターと連絡を取り、ライカド・ミノリスで起きた悲劇について報告した。また、エージェントから星の略奪に関与したと思われる{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}を含む、人類の敵の動向に関する情報も手に入れた。彼らの調査結果によると、その脅威は今や他の惑星にも及び…今度はあなたの惑星をも掌握しようとしているようだ、ロード・キャプテン」

languages.text: “我联系到了我的导师，报告了发生在小莱卡德上的悲惨事件。此外，我还从我的特工那里，获得了一部分关于人类之敌行动轨迹的情报，其中包括我们认为与盗窃恒星有关的{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}。根据这些情报，异形的威胁此刻正笼罩着诸多世界……他们这次的目标是你的世界，舰长大人。”
languages.original_text: "I was able to contact my mentor and report the tragic events that transpired on Rykad Minoris. I also received some information from my agents regarding the movements and actions of enemies of Humanity, including the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} that we're assuming were involved in the theft of the star. According to their findings, the threat now hangs over other worlds... this time yours, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: “我联系到了我的导师，报告了发生在小莱卡德上的悲惨事件。此外，我还从我的特工那里，获得了一部分关于人类之敌行动轨迹的情报，其中包括我们认为与盗窃恒星有关的{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}。根据这些情报，异形的威胁此刻正笼罩着诸多世界……他们这次的目标是你的世界，舰长大人。”

languages.text: «Logré contactar con mi mentor y contarle acerca de la calamidad que se cernió en Rykad Minoris. También recibí información de mis agentes sobre los movimientos e incursiones de los enemigos de la Humanidad, incluidos los {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} que pensamos que participaron en el robo de la estrella. Según lo que han descubierto, la amenaza se cierne ahora sobre otros mundos... en esta ocasión el suyo, Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: "I was able to contact my mentor and report the tragic events that transpired on Rykad Minoris. I also received some information from my agents regarding the movements and actions of enemies of Humanity, including the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} that we're assuming were involved in the theft of the star. According to their findings, the threat now hangs over other worlds... this time yours, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: «Logré contactar con mi mentor y contarle acerca de la calamidad que se cernió en Rykad Minoris. También recibí información de mis agentes sobre los movimientos e incursiones de los enemigos de la Humanidad, incluidos los {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} que pensamos que participaron en el robo de la estrella. Según lo que han descubierto, la amenaza se cierne ahora sobre otros mundos... en esta ocasión el suyo, Lord Capitán».

languages.text: « J'ai réussi à contacter mon mentor pour l'informer des événements tragiques survenus sur Rykad Minoris. Mes agents m'ont également transmis des rapports sur les déplacements et les agissements de certains ennemis de l'humanité, parmi lesquels les {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g} que nous soupçonnons d'avoir participé au vol de l'étoile. À en croire ces informations, la menace pèse désormais sur d'autres mondes... les vôtres, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »
languages.original_text: "I was able to contact my mentor and report the tragic events that transpired on Rykad Minoris. I also received some information from my agents regarding the movements and actions of enemies of Humanity, including the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} that we're assuming were involved in the theft of the star. According to their findings, the threat now hangs over other worlds... this time yours, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai réussi à contacter mon mentor pour l'informer des événements tragiques survenus sur Rykad Minoris. Mes agents m'ont également transmis des rapports sur les déplacements et les agissements de certains ennemis de l'humanité, parmi lesquels les {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g} que nous soupçonnons d'avoir participé au vol de l'étoile. À en croire ces informations, la menace pèse désormais sur d'autres mondes... les vôtres, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »

languages.text: "Ich konnte meinen Mentor kontaktieren und von den tragischen Vorfällen auf Rykad Minoris berichten. Außerdem erhielt ich Informationen von meinen Agenten über die Bewegungen und Aktionen der Feinde der Menschheit, einschließlich der {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}, von denen wir annehmen, dass sie am Diebstahl des Sterns beteiligt waren. Ihren Erkenntnissen zufolge sind jetzt andere Welten bedroht ... und diesmal Eure, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "I was able to contact my mentor and report the tragic events that transpired on Rykad Minoris. I also received some information from my agents regarding the movements and actions of enemies of Humanity, including the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} that we're assuming were involved in the theft of the star. According to their findings, the threat now hangs over other worlds... this time yours, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "Ich konnte meinen Mentor kontaktieren und von den tragischen Vorfällen auf Rykad Minoris berichten. Außerdem erhielt ich Informationen von meinen Agenten über die Bewegungen und Aktionen der Feinde der Menschheit, einschließlich der {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}, von denen wir annehmen, dass sie am Diebstahl des Sterns beteiligt waren. Ihren Erkenntnissen zufolge sind jetzt andere Welten bedroht ... und diesmal Eure, Lord Captain."

languages.text: "Yönderimle görüşüp Rykad Minoris'te yaşanan trajik hadiseleri bildirdim. Ayrıca adamlarımdan İnsanlığın düşmanlarının hareket ve eylemlerine dair bilgiler edindim. Yıldızın çalınmasında rol oynadığını düşündüğümüz {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zenolara{/g} dair duyumlar da aldım. Eldeki bulgulara göre tehlike, artık diğer dünyaların da kapısında. Bu seferki hedefi senin dünyan Lord Kaptan."
languages.original_text: "I was able to contact my mentor and report the tragic events that transpired on Rykad Minoris. I also received some information from my agents regarding the movements and actions of enemies of Humanity, including the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} that we're assuming were involved in the theft of the star. According to their findings, the threat now hangs over other worlds... this time yours, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "Mentorumla görüştüm ve Rykad Minoris'te yaşanan trajediyi bildirdim. Ayrıca adamlarımdan İnsanlığın düşmanlarının hareketlerine ve neler yaptıklarına dair bilgiler edindim. Yıldızın çalınmasında rol oynadığını düşündüğümüz {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zenolara{/g} dair duyumlar da aldım. Adamlarımın bulgularına göre tehlike artık diğer dünyaları da ilgilendiriyor. Hatta bu sefer size çok yakın Lord Kaptan."
